Class SharedData

java.lang.Object
SharedData
public class SharedData
extends java.lang.Object
The SharedData class is a container for shared data used in a multi-threaded or collaborative environment. It includes an integer array, a boolean array, a boolean flag, and a constant integer value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SharedData​(int[] array, int b)
    Constructs a SharedData object with the specified integer array and constant value.

    Retrieves the constant integer value.

    Retrieves the boolean flag.
    boolean[] getWinArray()
    Retrieves the boolean array used for tracking results or states.
    void setFlag​(boolean flag)
    Sets the boolean flag to the specified value.
    void setWinArray​(boolean[] winArray)
    Sets the boolean array used for tracking results or states.
